name: Wave Dungeon
description:
In the Cave of the Goddesses, if one can overcome the ordeals imposed by the goddesses, he or she will gain great power.
And then, in search of more power, the daredevil adventurers will again face another ordeal...

Wave Danjon is a roguelike RPG in which the player is forced to navigate a map that switches at regular intervals.
Conquer dungeons that become more powerful and evil with each wave!

Game Features

.・Simple design with only one room that does not require exploration, allowing you to concentrate on the battle!


・Replayability to restart immediately after death!


・Tense feeling of being surrounded by many enemies at each wave change!


・The sense of accomplishment by overcoming repeated crises!
